import { getKnobs } from '../../../tools/knobsHelper';
import { TableContentFromObject, FormOutput, CollapsibleJsonSnippet } from '../../../tools/docTools';
import { defaultMock, youtubeDemoMock, vimeoDemoMock, zoomDemoMock, youtubeDemoWithoutScreenshotsMock, tallImagesMock } from '../../../../mocks/components/productImageViewer';
import { ProductImageViewer } from '../ProductImageViewer';

export const productImageViewerSettings = {
    layout: 'horizontal-thumbnails'
};

export const storyWrapperStyles = { width: '100%', maxWidth: 630, margin: '0' };

<Meta title="Components/Product Image Viewer" component={ProductImageViewer} />

# ProductImageViewer
<br />

## `ProductImageViewers` are used to build product image galleries.
<br />

    <Story name="Horizontal">
        <div style={storyWrapperStyles}>

    </Story>
</Canvas>

## Usage Example
<CollapsibleJsonSnippet
    summary="productImageViewerData"
    code={defaultMock}
/>
<br />
<CollapsibleJsonSnippet
    summary="settingsData"
    code={getKnobs(ProductImageViewer.schema().form)}
/>

```jsx
import {
    ProductImageViewer
} from '@appdirect/sfb-theme-components/src/components/product-image-viewer/ProductImageViewer';

<ProductImageViewer data={productImageViewerData} settings={settingsData} />

```
